design.title: AnkiGenix Design System
design.colorScheme: Minimal Color Scheme ¬∑ Blue ¬∑ Black ¬∑ Gray ¬∑ White
design.focus: Focus on learning, reduce cognitive load
design.primaryBlueDesc: Used for primary action buttons, links, emphasis content
design.bodyLarge: This is large body text. Suitable for important paragraphs and introductory text. Body Large Text.
design.bodyStandard: This is standard body text. Suitable for most content display. Standard body text for most content.
design.bodySecondary: This is secondary text. Used for secondary information, hint text. Secondary text for hints and labels.
design.bodyCaption: This is the smallest text. Used for annotations, timestamps, etc. Caption text for timestamps and metadata.
design.basicCardDesc: Bordered white card, shows shadow on hover
design.subtleCardDesc: Gray background card, suitable for differentiating content areas
design.darkCardDesc: Dark background, suitable for emphasizing key content
design.infoAlertDesc: This is a normal info message to inform users of relevant content.
design.successAlertDesc: Your flashcards have been generated successfully, you can start learning now!
design.systemAlertDesc: You have 5 flashcards to review, it's recommended to complete them today.
design.errorAlertDesc: Generation failed, please check input content and try again.
design.principleFocusDesc: Minimal colors reduce visual interference, allowing users to focus on learning content.
design.principleConsistencyDesc: Consistent spacing, rounded corners, and shadow system to maintain interface consistency.
design.principleClarityDesc: Clear visual hierarchy, important information emphasized in blue, secondary information in gray.
design.principleEfficiencyDesc: Reduce cognitive load, allowing users to complete operations quickly and return to learning essence.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.choosePlan: Choose a plan that's right for you
pricing.description: From free trial to enterprise solutions, we provide suitable pricing plans for every learning need
pricing.costSavings: Typically save more than 30% compared to standard plans
pricing.readyToStart: Ready to start your learning journey?
pricing.freeTrial7Days: Sign up now and enjoy a 7-day free trial of Pro features
pricing.faqSubtitle: Answers to common questions about pricing and subscriptions
pricing.cancelAnytime: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
pricing.cancelAnytimeAnswer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime. After cancellation, your account will downgrade to free at the end of the current billing cycle.
pricing.annualDiscount: What are the benefits of annual billing?
pricing.annualDiscountAnswer: Choose annual billing to enjoy 2 months free, equivalent to 17% discount. Annual users also receive priority feature updates.
pricing.paymentMethodsAnswer: We support credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Alipay, WeChat Pay and other payment methods.
pricing.freeForever: Does the free version have an expiration date?
pricing.freeForeverAnswer: The free version has no expiration date, you can use basic features permanently. But there is a monthly generation limit.
pricing.upgradeDowngrade: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
pricing.upgradeDowngradeAnswer: You can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan anytime. Upgrades take effect immediately, downgrades take effect in the next billing cycle.
pricing.teamSeats: How many users does the team version support?
pricing.teamSeatsAnswer: The team version includes 10 user seats as default, and you can purchase additional seats as needed, each additional seat costs 9.9 yuan per month.
pricing.enterpriseDescription: We provide customized solutions for large education institutions and enterprises, including private deployment, custom feature development, dedicated technical support, etc.

freePlan.name: Free
freePlan.description: Perfect for individual users to try

proPlan.name: Pro
proPlan.description: Perfect for students and individual learners

teamPlan.name: Team
teamPlan.description: Perfect for educational institutions and enterprise teams

results.noRecordsDescription: Start creating your first flashcard set!

home.metaTitle: Ankigenix - AI-Powered Scientific Flashcard Generator | Efficient Anki Learning Cards
home.metaDescription: Ankigenix is an AI-powered scientific flashcard generator that supports multiple input methods including text, files, URLs, and videos. Intelligently generate high-quality learning flashcards. Boost learning efficiency and easily create Anki cards.
home.metaKeywords: Anki, Flashcard Generator, AI Learning Tool, Smart Cards, Efficient Learning, Spaced Repetition, Memory Cards, Learning Assistant, Knowledge Management
home.ogDescription: Accelerate your learning efficiency with the highest quality Anki cards. Supports multiple input methods, AI intelligently generates high-quality learning flashcards.
home.heroDescription: Ankigenix is an AI-powered scientific flashcard generator that supports multiple input methods and intelligently generates high-quality learning flashcards to make your learning more efficient and scientific.
home.powerfulAIDescription: Leveraging advanced artificial intelligence technology to provide you with the highest quality learning experience
home.multipleInputsDescription: Support text, files, URLs, videos and other input methods, easily import learning materials
home.aiGenerationDescription: Based on advanced AI algorithms, automatically generate high-quality Q&A cards to improve learning outcomes
home.qualityScoringDescription: Intelligently evaluate card quality to ensure each card effectively improves your learning efficiency
home.startJourneyDescription: Choose a plan that suits you and experience AI-driven smart learning immediately
home.simpleThreeSteps: Three simple steps to start your efficient learning journey
home.step1Description: Support text, files, URLs or video links, choose the input method that suits you best
home.step2Description: Our AI analyzes your materials and automatically generates high-quality Q&A cards
home.step3Description: Export as .apkg file and import directly into Anki to start efficient learning
home.footerSlogan: Accelerate your learning efficiency with the highest quality Anki cards

jsonLd.proDescription: Unlimited card generation, advanced AI generation, all input methods

featuresPage.heroDescription: Ankigenix integrates the most advanced AI technology to provide you with intelligent, efficient, and personalized learning card generation experience
featuresPage.coreFeaturesDescription: Four core features to comprehensively improve your learning efficiency
featuresPage.aiSmartGenerationDesc: Based on advanced AI technology, automatically analyze learning content and generate high-quality Anki flashcards
featuresPage.aiDetail1: Intelligent content analysis and key point extraction
featuresPage.aiDetail2: Automatically generate Q&A pairs and fill-in-the-blank questions
featuresPage.aiDetail3: Support multiple question types and difficulty adjustment
featuresPage.multipleInputsDesc: Support text, files, web links and other input methods to meet different learning scenarios
featuresPage.multiLanguageDesc: Support Chinese, English and other languages to meet the learning needs of global users
featuresPage.langDetail1: Intelligent recognition of Chinese and English content
featuresPage.smartDifficultyDesc: Automatically adjust flashcard difficulty and complexity based on learning goals and level
featuresPage.advancedFeaturesDesc: More powerful features to meet your various learning needs
featuresPage.batchProcessingDesc: Support batch processing of large amounts of content to improve learning efficiency
featuresPage.subjectSpecializationDesc: Optimized for different subjects to provide professional learning support
featuresPage.learningAnalyticsDesc: Detailed learning data analysis and progress tracking
featuresPage.cloudSyncDesc: Multi-device cloud synchronization, learn anytime anywhere
featuresPage.mobileOptimizationDesc: Perfectly adapted for mobile devices, supports offline learning
featuresPage.dataSecurityDesc: Enterprise-level data encryption and privacy protection
featuresPage.teamCollaborationDesc: Support team sharing and collaborative learning
featuresPage.continuousUpdateDesc: Regular feature updates and AI model optimization
featuresPage.useCasesDesc: Applicable to various learning scenarios to meet different user needs
featuresPage.examReviewDesc: Quickly create exam review cards to improve memory efficiency
featuresPage.examReviewExampleText: Convert textbook content into flashcards for systematic knowledge review
featuresPage.languageLearningDesc: Create vocabulary and grammar cards to accelerate language mastery
featuresPage.languageLearningExampleText: Extract new words from articles and automatically generate bilingual cards
featuresPage.skillTrainingDesc: Create professional knowledge cards to enhance professional competence
featuresPage.skillTrainingExampleText: Convert training materials into practical skill cards
featuresPage.academicResearchDesc: Organize research materials and build knowledge systems
featuresPage.academicResearchExampleText: Extract key concepts from papers and establish knowledge networks
featuresPage.ctaDescription: Start using Ankigenix now and let AI accelerate your learning
